result.eng: Turn right at the second crossroads.
result.ga: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.orig: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaire
result.html: Cas ar dheis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.
result.ponchtml: Cas ar ḋeis ag an dara crosaireTurn right at the second crossroads.

result.eng: You will see the shop on the right.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheis
result.html: Feicfidh tú an siopa ar dheisYou will see the shop on the right.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an siopa ar ḋeisYou will see the shop on the right.

result.eng: We don't often see wild animals.
result.ga: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáil
result.orig: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáil
result.html: Ní minic a bhíonn deis againn ainmhithe fiáine a fheiceáilWe don't often see wild animals.
result.ponchtml: Ní minic a ḃíonn deis againn ainṁiṫe fiáine a ḟeiceáilWe don't often see wild animals.

result.eng: Turn right at the next crossroad.
result.ga: Tiontaigh ar dheis ag an chéad chrosbhóthar eile
result.orig: Tiontaigh ar dheis ag an chéad chrosbhóthar eile
result.html: Tiontaigh ar dheis ag an chéad chrosbhóthar eileTurn right at the next crossroad.
result.ponchtml: Tiontaiġ ar ḋeis ag an ċéad ċrosḃóṫar eileTurn right at the next crossroad.

result.eng: And the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ga: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.orig: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheis
result.html: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folctha ar dheisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.
result.ponchtml: Agus tá na seomraí codlata agus seomra folcṫa ar ḋeisAnd the bedrooms and the bathroom are on the right.

result.eng: Is the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ga: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.orig: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheis
result.html: An é an leithreas an chéad doras ar dheisIs the toilet the first door on the right?
result.ponchtml: An é an leiṫreas an ċéad doras ar ḋeisIs the toilet the first door on the right?

result.eng: It is there on the right.
result.html: Tá sé ansin ar dheisIt is there on the right.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ansin ar ḋeisIt is there on the right.

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.orig: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail
result.html: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: Technological progress had created new opportunities.
result.ga: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíoch
result.orig: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíoch
result.html: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíochTechnological progress had created new opportunities.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deiseanna úra cruṫaiṫe ag dul ċun cinn teicneolaíoċTechnological progress had created new opportunities.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
